fsrtool.name: fsrtool_assets
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_assets` ( `itemID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locationID` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `typeID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `flag` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `singleton` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rawQuantity` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL, `contents` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lastFetch` int(11) DEFAULT '123456', PRIMARY KEY (`itemID`,`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
